title: You titled the article What happened to  Potter's field" tells about it but is it still there and exactly where?"
text: Hello. Sorry the answer was unclear. Flemington-Oak Grove Cemetery was created when they moved the older cemetery to extend 16th and 17th streets. I've added a map to the newer cemetery. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/07/what-happened-to-the-potters-field-along-17th-street-near-the-railroad-tracks/
